A

AbstractFormatHandler - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
Abstract base class for FormatHandler objects that import/export directory entries to/from LDAP directory servers in LDIF and DSML format.

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
This package defines the API and base classes for the objects that are used to import or export LDAP directory entries to or from DSML and LDIF file formats.
com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.apache - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.apache
The abstract base classes and concrete implementations for the Mojos that implement the goals of the plugin are defined in this package.
